plugins.name: Color Scale Variables
plugins.description: This Figma plugin streamlines the process of creating UI color themes and saving them to Figma variables. It generates tints and shades from a base color, following a standardized naming convention from 0 (white) to 1000 (black), with the base color at 500. Users can input their desired base color via hex code or a visual color picker, which then automatically generates a set of 10 color variations.
plugins.tagline: Generate tints and shades from a base colour and store them as variables - simply.

plugins.name: Apple Game
plugins.description:
I created this plugin called 'Apple Game' for my designer colleagues who love playing this game but feel hesitant in company. Now they can enjoy the game in Figma when they need to be refreshed!


  • Rule : drag apples to select a combination that adds up to 10.
  • For workers, this game comes in a default gray version. Press the "color to red" button to revert back to the original red apple color.
  • 'Ranking' feature will be added soon.


Feel free to share any bugs or suggestions by leaving a comment or sending me an email. 🤩
plugins.tagline: Get refreshed with this apple game!

plugins.name: J4F
plugins.description:
J4F (Jira for Figma) helps you to manage your Jira issues right from Figma. You can change issues status and attach related frames links to the issue in one click. No more jumping between tabs and copy-pasting links.


J4F is not affiliated with Jira or Figma, it's developed by a third-party developer.


Before you start, please open "Settings" and fill required data.


The plugin requires an internet connection for work.


We are in beta now, we will be glad to get any feedback and feature requests right here in comments or by email to karimshakirov+j4f@gmail.com.


We are using Mixpanel for analytics to make our product better. We store your Email, Jira URL, and Documents IDs to create customer profiles to understand different usage scenarios. We will not share or sell your data.


Pricing: While in Beta, J4F will be free, later we might change the pricing model.

plugins.name: Coordinates from centre
plugins.description:
When selecting an object that is nested within a Frame, this plugin will show you the object coordinates relative to the centre of the Frame and the centre of the object.


You can use the copy buttons to easily copy the coordinates to the clipboard.


Current limitations:

  1. It doesn't show accurate coordinates of objects nested within components.
  2. When objects are not snapped to the pixel grid, whether because of the user settings or because of a layout group positioning, the resulting coordinates will be rounded to the closest integer.
plugins.tagline: Get the coordinages of a selected object relative to the center of the parent Frame.

49110.name: Coordinates from centre
49110.description:
When selecting an object that is nested within a Frame, this plugin will show you the object coordinates relative to the centre of the Frame and the centre of the object.


You can use the copy buttons to easily copy the coordinates to the clipboard.


Current limitations:

  1. It doesn't show accurate coordinates of objects nested within components.
  2. When objects are not snapped to the pixel grid, whether because of the user settings or because of a layout group positioning, the resulting coordinates will be rounded to the closest integer.
49110.release_notes: This version handles nested layout groups and nested frames better than before. Also displays a message when a rotated object is selected and coordinates cannot be shown.
49110.tagline: Get the coordinages of a selected object relative to the center of the parent Frame.

plugins.name: VariablesToCode
plugins.description:
VariablesToCode is a powerful Figma plugin that transforms design system variables into production-ready code for multiple platforms. It bridges the gap between design and development by providing seamless code conversion capabilities.


Supported Formats:

  1. Android (XML)
  2. iOS (Swift)
  3. Flutter (Dart)
  4. Web (CSS)
  5. JSON


Variable Types:

  1. Color
  2. Number
  3. String
  4. Boolean


Key Features:

  1. Dark/Light mode support
  2. Automatic Variable Alias resolution
  3. Responsive design support
  4. Preview & Download


Important Notes:

  1. Only supports mode names: Light, Dark or Mobile, Tablet, PC
  2. Other mode names may not convert properly


---------


VariablesToCode는 디자인 시스템 변수를 다양한 플랫폼의 제품용 코드로 변환하는 Figma 플러그인입니다. 디자인과 개발 사이의 간극을 원활한 코드 변환 기능을 통해 해소합니다.


지원 형식:

  1. Android (XML)
  2. iOS (Swift)
  3. Flutter (Dart)
  4. Web (CSS)
  5. JSON


변수 타입:

  1. Color
  2. Number
  3. String
  4. Boolean


주요 기능:

  1. 라이트/다크 모드 지원
  2. 변수 별칭 자동 해석
  3. 반응형 디자인 지원
  4. 미리보기 & 다운로드


유의사항:

  1. 지원되는 모드명: Light, Dark 또는 Mobile, Tablet, PC
  2. 다른 모드명 사용 시 정상 변환되지 않을 수 있습니다.
plugins.tagline: Transforms Figma variables into production-ready code for multiple platforms.

plugins.name: Generate 01
plugins.description:
Generate is prompt-to-design copilot that creates variations of your brand assets within seconds.


Plugin is in public beta.

Sign up via plugin and get 50 free generation credits.


Use cases

Quickly populate assets with text and images

Generate variations of assets using brand styles

Bulk translate assets to different languages

Create custom presentations for different clients

Generate on-demand portfolio visuals

Many more


Get started

▸ Watch file setup tutorial (3:43)

✶ Play with prompts in a demo file


To use "Generate" with your file, you will need to add designs from which to generate and describe what to customize in these designs. The setup usually takes 3 minutes:

  1. Select a frame and run "Generate → Add Template" to add template. Describe how and when to use the template. Add several templates, or stick to only one design. The frame should be in a section or in the root of your file page.
  2. Select a layer inside your template to describe how to use it via "Generate → Add Layer". Specify which fills, strokes, or effects styles to apply. Describe how to generate text including tone of voice and number of words.
  3. Generate new variations by typing a prompt. When prompting, make sure to mention how many variants you need, changes you want to apply, specific template or size of the frame.

Explore step by step the manual in the playground file. This plugin uses existing styles, so make sure to add all the text, fill, effect and stroke styles.


Features

✧ Generate from images. Drag and drop images to Figma and use them with your templates

✧ Generate with text. Add text to Figma, and describe how to use it in a template.

✧ Assign file instructions. Describe the high-level rules for every generation

✧ File handoff. Setup the rules for the file and give access to your team


Support

Report a bug

Discord

Email


Thank you for your interest in "Generate" beta

Leave feedback

Request more generations
plugins.tagline: AI copilot guided by your design system

plugins.name: AI Image Maker (free)
plugins.description:
AI Image Maker is a Figma plugin that lets you instantly create up to 4 AI image generated images or graphics right from within Figma. No need to log into another service, add an API key, or anything else.


This is great for people who want to add some context to their designs before they share it with a client.


👋🏻 First things first:

  1. 100% free: no payment or fees required
  2. All AI images created can be used for personal and commercial projects


🥧 Incredibly easy to use:

  1. Super simple: just open up the plugin, enter your prompt, and click the "Create" button
  2. Choose to either create 1 or 4 images at once
  3. Browse through your previously created AI images to quickly insert one you made in an earlier design session


🤔 More:

  1. All AI images are added as the top most layer so you can easily find it
  2. All AI images are named with "🪄 AI Image Maker" at the beginning so they can easily be found / searched for


🛟 Feedback:

  1. We'd love any ideas or questions you have: feedback@berryplugins.com
  2. Leave a comment if you want to tell people how great this plugin is


🎉🎉🎉
plugins.tagline: Create AI images in 10 seconds for your designs.

plugins.name: Imgazilla - Favicon exporter, background removal & multi-format image exporting with optimization.
plugins.description:
Features


Background removal

  1. Remove background from images.
  2. Save result or add to page in just one click.
  3. Unlimited usage rights.
  4. Secure (Plugin doesn't save copy of images).


Image compressor & exporter


  1. Shrink your images up to 95% more effectively than Figma’s default exports.
  2. Effortlessly downsize and compress your Figma images, layers, supporting multiple sizes and formats.
  3. Automatically save your optimized images as a convenient .zip file.
  4. Compatible with various formats, including PNG, JPG, SVG, WEBP, AVIF.
  5. Export as PNG, JPG, SVG, WebP, AVIF


Favicon exporter

  1. Generate favicon from selected icon.
  2. Supports various sizes.
  3. Preview your favicon to see how it will appear on your site.
  4. Includes additional files for Android, iOS, and manifest.json for PWA compatibility.
  5. Provides HTML code for easy integration.


Support


If you have any questions or encounter any issues while using Imgazilla, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me at support@imgazilla.app. I'm here to help!
plugins.tagline: Export Favicons, background removal & optimize JPG, PNG, SVG, WEBP, AVIF files directly from Figma.

124891.name: Imgazilla - Favicon exporter, background removal & multi-format image exporting with optimization.
124891.description:
Features


Background removal

  1. Remove background from images.
  2. Save result or add to page in just one click.
  3. Unlimited usage rights.
  4. Secure (Plugin doesn't save copy of images).


Image compressor & exporter


  1. Shrink your images up to 95% more effectively than Figma’s default exports.
  2. Effortlessly downsize and compress your Figma images, layers, supporting multiple sizes and formats.
  3. Automatically save your optimized images as a convenient .zip file.
  4. Compatible with various formats, including PNG, JPG, SVG, WEBP, AVIF.
  5. Export as PNG, JPG, SVG, WebP, AVIF


Favicon exporter

  1. Generate favicon from selected icon.
  2. Supports various sizes.
  3. Preview your favicon to see how it will appear on your site.
  4. Includes additional files for Android, iOS, and manifest.json for PWA compatibility.
  5. Provides HTML code for easy integration.


Support


If you have any questions or encounter any issues while using Imgazilla, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me at support@imgazilla.app. I'm here to help!

manifest.name: Imgazilla - Favicon exporter and image optimisation

plugins.name: Topo
plugins.description:
Review and report instances and components from Figma.


Topo is a Figma Plugin that will allow you report and comment on specific components and post it to any Slack channel or endpoint you want.


You can try Topo for free for up to 3 component reports. Once you buy a license you're entitled to a lifetime license key and updates, while supporting and contributing to build better features and more plugins and tools.


Get lifetime license


General usage:

  • Add Topo integration for Slack
  • With Topo opened, select an Instance or Component you want to review or report in your Figma file.
  • Hit 'Report'.
  • Check the Slack channel and keep track of what's being reported and resolved.


Crafted for design system and library management teams

Allow everyone to report component errors, bugs or issues in a single channel, integrated with the tools you use everyday. Keep track of what’s being resolved.


No need to stop designing

Stop jumping into calls and sending messages that get lost in the discussion. Report without leaving Figma.


Connect your own endpoint for integration with other tools

If you don’t want to use the default Slack app, you can send the reported data to any custom endpoint. Maybe your own API to create JIRA tickets?

accepted.name: Santiago Moreno
accepted.description: In love with Code, Motion and Typography. I really, really enjoy building stuff and prototyping 🇨🇴

plugins.name: Analytiks
plugins.description:
Analytiks gives you a bird's eye view on your Figma file and helps you understand the status and health of the work you and others put in with easy-to-read analytics at a glance.


Jumping in a new project and you want to know what's the situation with the design system? Do you want to spot how many groups there are or hidden files? Analytiks helps you answer all these questions and more with smart, beautiful and useful analytics for every Figma file.


Analysis of Figma files takes from a couple of seconds to a few minutes depending on the size and complexity of the Figma file. Be mindful of the complexity of big files and decide if you want to run the plugin.

plugins.name: XTM Connect - Figma
plugins.description:
Figma and XTM Cloud – Picture Perfect

Figma’s design features bring ideas to life and make content sing.

XTM Cloud’s translation technology keeps the voices in tune for any audience.

With Figma and XTM Cloud, you can go where your imagination takes you.

  1. Synchronise between Figma and XTM Cloud and start translating design content from the moment of creation
  2. Give linguists visual context so they can tailor messages to multilingual audiences
  3. Make an image and a brand equally appealing and resonant in Berlin, Beijing and Buenos Aires


Intelligent Automation For Design Content

  1. Transfer of content from Figma to XTM Cloud is instantaneous
  2. XTM Cloud transcreation delivers creativity and a range of alternative translations to choose from
  3. Multilingual content is returned to Figma at the click of a button


You’re The Voice

  1. Project managers, linguists and designers all have valuable opinions to share
  2. XTM Connect - Figma unites each team members – and each voice – in pursuit of excellence
  3. No thread is lost, no question left unanswered 


Get It Fast And Get It Right

  1. Linguists work on content while designers are working on images
  2. Designers have instant visibility of translated content and how it will appear in context
  3. Talented people working more quickly, working more productively and working together


What’s Your 2020s Vision?

  1. Share it with confidence
  2. Share it with persuasiveness
  3. Share it with the world


These customers trust us, and so can you

GAP, Swiss Post, Kyocera, Crown, Sony Interactive Entertainment, Expedia Group, BigPoint, RICOH


Getting the most out of XTM Connect - Figma

To take full advantage of XTM Connect - Figma, create an account on XTM Cloud. Get in touch with our Partner team and they’ll give you all the help you want.

For more information or for a free trial of XTM Cloud, check out our website: xtm.cloud
plugins.tagline: The Figma connector for XTM Cloud enables agile localization of design content.

plugins.name: Arcade: Turn designs into interactive demos
plugins.description:
From passive to interactive storytelling: Export your designs to Arcade and turn them into engaging, on-brand demos.


Arcade is an interactive demo platform that allows teams to create effortlessly beautiful demos in minutes.


Arcade’s Figma plugin allows you to transform static designs into interactive, clickable demos, enabling faster feedback, better collaboration, and more engaging product storytelling.


To get started, select the frames or layers to export to Arcade. With the click of a button, the plug-in will convert them to an interactive demo.


Teams are using the Arcade plugin for:

☆ Design reviews

☆ Gathering customer feedback on new features

☆ Sharing product roadmap in sales conversations

☆ Product launches

☆ Personalizing UI for collateral and customer demos


This plugin is built for designers, marketers, and product teams that need to showcase product functionality and design in an interactive way.


Getting started with Arcade:

Arcade has free and paid plan options. Sign up for free at https://www.arcade.software


Here are some feature highlights from each plan:


Free plan:

  1. Upload media: images, videos, pdfs.
  2. Camera recording
  3. Video editing
  4. Synthetic voiceovers
  5. Hotspots and callouts
  6. Background colors/music


Paid plans:


  1. Pan and zoom
  2. GIF and video export
  3. Blur (redaction)
  4. Custom branding
  5. Forms and form embeds
  6. Commenting
  7. HTML editing


… and more!


We can’t wait to see what you build.
plugins.tagline: Create effortlessly beautiful demos in minutes.

plugins.name: Jet Admin Export
plugins.description:
Easily export your Figma designs to Jet Admin No-Code web apps builder. Add data binding and interactions to your Figma component designs to make them work in a real web application.


How it works:

  1. In Jet Admin: open Component Designer to add or edit your custom component
  2. Click Menu -> Import from Figma
  3. Copy Import key
  4. In Figma: Select single layer you want to export (Frame, Group, Section, etc.)
  5. Run Jet Admin Export plugin
  6. Enter Import key from Jet Admin
  7. Click Export selected
  8. In Jet admin: reload Figma imports in Import from Figma popup and click import on the imported design
plugins.tagline: Create No-Code web apps with Figma design

plugins.name: Hide Layer from Instances
plugins.description:
Iterations always demand new additions to components. All of us have encountered cases where we need to add something to a component but don’t want that to show up in all the hundreds and thousands of existing instances. We finally end up creating a new component so that the existing work is not affected. This plugin solves this issue with a single click.

Follow these steps to hide a particular layer from all component instances
• Select the layer/group/frame that you want to hide from one of the instances of a component
• Select Hide Layers from Instances -> Hide
• The selected layer/group/frame will be hidden from all instances in the current page

Use the Force Hide option if the layer that you want to hide is part of a component that is nested in multiple other components and you want to hide the layer in all of them at once.
Eg.: If you want to hide a layer in an icon component that is already used in various other components like different state and sizes of buttons, then Hide option will just hide the layer in the selected state or size of the button. Whereas Force Hide will hide the layer in all the instances of all the components that this icon is used.

This plugin works only on instances and not on components
CAUTION: When using the Force Hide option. ensure that the name of the layer you are hiding is unique. If not, multiple layers may get hidden.

Feels too small a feature for a plugin? There is also a Scripter File for this that you can use. https://www.figma.com/community/file/858014268242545394/Hide-Layers-from-Instances

Do let us know if you want any additional features. We'll try adding it. Cheers! :)

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具 Data Vision Chart
plugins.description:
Introduction

This is the basic version of the Data Vision chart generator plugin, designed to help users create simple and effective data visualizations such as line, bar, donut, and pie charts. It offers easy chart generation with customizable colors and exportable designs. For advanced features like more customization, additional chart types, and more robust data handling, please try the Data Vision Pro version.


Function Description

  1. Supports the creation of four chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customizable colors with predefined themes for visual consistency.
  3. Ability to add and modify data rows easily within an intuitive UI.
  4. Export charts as Figma frames for further design adjustments.
  5. Multilingual support, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Choose the type of chart you want to create.
  2. Enter your data labels and values, and select a color scheme or customize colors.
  3. Set the chart dimensions, if needed, and click the "Generate Chart" button.
  4. View the generated chart as a Figma frame, and make further adjustments as needed.


Notes

  1. This basic version includes essential chart types and features.
  2. Ensure all data fields are filled out before generating a chart.
  3. For more chart types, advanced styling, and professional-level features, check out the Data Vision Pro version.


介绍

这是 Data Vision 图表生成器插件的基础版，旨在帮助用户轻松创建简单有效的数据可视化图表，包括折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。该版本支持自定义颜色和导出设计功能。欲体验更多自定义功能、额外的图表类型以及更强大的数据处理能力，请尝试 Data Vision Pro 版本。


功能说明

  1. 支持创建四种图表类型：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供预设主题色，可进行自定义配色。
  3. 用户界面直观，轻松添加和修改数据行。
  4. 可将生成的图表导出为 Figma 框架进行进一步设计。
  5. 支持多语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要生成的图表类型。
  2. 输入数据标签和数值，选择配色方案或自定义颜色。
  3. 设置图表尺寸（如果需要），然后点击“生成图表”按钮。
  4. 生成的图表将作为 Figma 框架显示，您可以进行进一步的调整。


注意事项

  1. 该基础版包含基本的图表类型和功能。
  2. 确保所有数据字段已填写完整后再生成图表。
  3. 如需更多图表类型、进阶样式和专业功能，请尝试 Data Vision Pro 版本。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Create basic charts effortlessly for data visualization.

  2. 提供预设主题色，可进行自定义配色。
  3. 用户界面直观，轻松添加和修改数据行。
  4. 可将生成的图表导出为 Figma 框架进行进一步设计。
  5. 支持多语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要生成的图表类型。
  2. 输入数据标签和数值，选择配色方案或自定义颜色。
  3. 设置图表尺寸（如果需要），然后点击“生成图表”按钮。
  4. 生成的图表将作为 Figma 框架显示，您可以进行进一步的调整。


注意事项

  1. 该基础版包含基本的图表类型和功能。
  2. 确保所有数据字段已填写完整后再生成图表。
  3. 如需更多图表类型、进阶样式和专业功能，请尝试 Data Vision Pro 版本。

plugins.name: Betafi: Import Notes and Embed Clips
plugins.description:
Bring user feedback to where product teams (Fig)jam

Import notes and clips from user feedback sessions into your FigJam board to easily review user requirements and usability feedback with your team and stakeholders.


How it works: Watch the demo

  1. Install the plugin and log in to your Betafi account (or sign up for Free).
  2. Select the project containing the notes/clips you want to bring over to FigJam.
  3. Click “Import All” or drag and drop selected notes/clips to FigJam.


Why Betafi?

  • Whether you use Betafi or Zoom (or Google Meet coming soon), you can use Betafi to capture the ‘aha moments’ and take notes within pre-created questions. Then import your notes to FigJam.
  • Post-call, dig out the ‘aha’ moments from your feedback calls using the recording synced with the transcript and your notes. And then import these important moments to FigJam.
  • You can also bring your Figma prototypes to Betafi, conduct moderated usability testing sessions, then clip videos of user struggles, and import the mini-clips to FigJam.


Your user insights should live on FigJam.

Try Betafi for FREE to avoid switching between multiple tools.

Learn More
plugins.tagline: Transform Your FigJam Board into a User Insights Powerhouse

plugins.name: QQT Fanyi
plugins.description:
这是一个为简体中文设计的翻译插件，它包含两个功能：

1）将画布中的内容翻译为繁体/英文；

2）将画布名称翻译为繁体/英文。


使用方法：

1）启动插件。

2）选择单个或者多个画布。

3）选择需要翻译的目标语言。

4）如果只翻译画布名称则打开“只翻译画布名称”，翻译内容则可忽略。

5）点击“翻译”后即可完成设计稿适配。


*本插件只支持源语言为简体中文的字段


This is a translation plugin designed for Simplified Chinese. It contains two functions:

1) Translate the content in the canvas into Traditional Chinese/English;

2) Translate the canvas name into Traditional Chinese/English.


How to use:

1) Start the plugin.

2) Select one or more canvases.

3) Select the target language to be translated.

4) If you only want to translate the canvas name, turn on "Translate canvas name only" and ignore the translation content.

5) Click "Translate" to complete the design adaptation.


*This plugin only supports fields with the source language in Simplified Chinese

plugins.name: Image Background Remover
plugins.description:
Image Background Remover


Instantly remove backgrounds from your images with our powerful and easy-to-use plugin.


Features:


  1. One-Click Background Removal: Simply select an image and let our AI do the rest.
  2. High-Quality Results: Get precise cutouts with clean edges.
  3. Multiple Input Methods: Upload images, paste URLs, or drag and drop directly from your desktop.
  4. Preview and Edit: See the results before applying, with options to adjust if needed.
  5. Figma Integration: Seamlessly add the processed images to your Figma designs.


How to Use:


1. Upload images, paste URLs, or drag and drop directly from your desktop.

2. Click the "Remove Background" button.

3. Wait a few seconds for the AI to process your image.

4. Your image will appear with the background removed, ready to use in your design.


Limitations:


  1. Maximum image size: 1.5MB
  2. Maximum resolution: 2000x2000 pixels
  3. Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP
  4. Free tier: 10 image processes per month


Pro Version:


Unlock unlimited background removals and priority processing with our Pro version. Perfect for designers who work with images frequently.


Privacy & Security:


We take your data seriously. All image processing is done securely, and we do not store your images after processing.


Transform your design workflow with our Image Background Remover plugin. Say goodbye to tedious manual cutouts and hello to more time for creativity!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly remove image background. Precise, and user-friendly. Elevate your designs with ease.

plugins.name: Sequence frames
plugins.description:
Sequence frames

For mass creation of frames

  • You can enter values with any separators. Each pair of numbers will be considered as width and height, they will also be in the frame name.
  • Values can be copied from excel tables vertically or horizontally.
  • When entering values, it immediately shows how many frames will be created and with what sizes.
  • A value that has no pair (undefined) will not lead to the creation of a frame.


Для массового создания фреймов

  • Вписывать значения можно с любыми разделителями. Каждая пара чисел будет считаться шириной и высотой, они же будут в названии фрейма.
  • Значения можете смело копировать из таблиц excel хоть вертикально, хоть горизонтально.
  • При вписывании значений сразу показывает сколько фреймов будет создано и с какими размерами.
  • Значение, которому нет пары (undefined) не будет приводить к созданию фрейма.

plugins.name: Variables Generator
plugins.description:
Automate creating local variables by using JSON and speed up your workflow. Simply use the formats below to generate your variables, colors must be in a hex format and can support alpha channels via 8 digits.


⚠️ NOTE: This plugin only supports color variables, future updates may eventually support all variable types.


Demo

View this video demo of the plugin working with aliasing.


Single Mode

{
"VariableName": "Hex",
"VariableName": "Hex"
}


Multiple Modes

{
"VariableName": {
"Mode": "Hex",
"Mode": "Hex"
},
"VariableName": {
"Mode": "Hex",
"Mode": "Hex"
}
}


Aliasing

You can use aliasing across your local variables as long as their names are unique.


{
"VariableName": "$VariableAlias",
"VariableName": "$VariableAlias",
"VariableName": "$VariableAlias"
}


  1. VariableName is the name of your variable
  2. $VariableAlias is the name of the alias you are aliasing, be sure to include the $ to enable aliasing
  3. Mode is the name of your mode, each variable must contain the same modes
  4. Hex is the hex code of your color, supports 8-digit hex codes for transparency


Examples


Single mode that creates a color palette:


{
"black": "#0e1112",
"white": "#d4d7d6",
"grey": "#4d5a5e",
"blue": "#519aba",
"green": "#8dc149",
"orange": "#e37933",
"pink": "#f55385",
"purple": "#a074c4",
"red": "#cc3e44",
"steel": "#7494a3",
"yellow": "#cbcb41"
}


Multiple modes that use 8-digit hex codes:


{
"tab-activeBackground": {
"Dark": "#1f1f1f",
"Light": "#ffffff",
"Monokai": "#272822"
},
"tab-activeBorder": {
"Dark": "#1f1f1f",
"Light": "#f8f8f8",
"Monokai": "#00000000"
},
"tab-activeBorderTop": {
"Dark": "#0078d4",
"Light": "#005fb8",
"Monokai": "#00000000"
},
"tab-activeForeground": {
"Dark": "#ffffff",
"Light": "#3b3b3b",
"Monokai": "#ffffff"
},
"tab-border": {
"Dark": "#2b2b2b",
"Light": "#e5e5e5",
"Monokai": "#1e1f1c"
}
}


Using aliasing across collections:


Colors collection:


{
"black": "#0e1112",
"white": "#d4d7d6",
"grey": "#4d5a5e"
}


Tokens collection that references Colors variables:


{
"button": {
"Dark": "$black",
"Light": "$white",
"Monokai": "$grey"
}
}
plugins.tagline: Generate local Figma variables using JSON

Moreover, if you have any design-related questions or prompts, this plugin can use OpenAI's text capabilities to provide you with accurate, insightful answers.

plugins.name: Reset Image
plugins.description:
Plugin Functions

  1. [Reset Size] - To reset an image layer to its original size/dimensions when it was first imported into Figma
  2. [Reset Effects] - To reset image fill effects
  3. [Reset Image] - To reset both size and effects at the same time


Guideline

  1. This plugin can work with one element or a selection of multiple elements.
  2. An element’s first fill (the most bottom one in the UI) has to be an image. You can have additional fills on top of this.
  3. If you try with elements whose first fill is not an image, the plugin will throw an error or those elements will be ignored.
  4. [Reset Size] If the original image was large, it will take some time to reset to the original size/dimensions and it may temporarily cause the Figma app to be unresponsive.
  5. [Reset Effects] The following image fill effects are reset: fill opacity, fill visibility, fill rotation, fill blending mode, all fill image filters (Exposure, Contrast, Saturation, Temperature, Tint, Highlights, Shadows).
plugins.tagline: Reset Image Size & Effects

  4. [Reset Size] If the original image was large, it will take some time to reset to the original size/dimensions and it may temporarily cause the Figma app to be unresponsive.
